about_the_game:
Find Eden is a story-rich experience full of cats!

THIS IS TIMMY!

Timmy is a simple creature. You control him and the more you play, the more you learn about his personality, what he likes, what makes him laugh, what scares him and...what his darkest desires are.

Indirectly you will find clues about the world of 'Find Eden', its characters and the mystery that veiled this fantastic world. 

MEET CATS IN THEIR OWN REALM

FRIEND OR FOE?

NEW GAME MECHANIC

Timmy receives an unknown talisman that holds inexplicable powers!

When entering a new world, with this talisman you can plan ahead and manipulate your surroundings by setting up traps, making platforms move, placing portals, throwing spells to see creatures hiding in the dark and more!

HAND-DRAWN UNIQUE ASSETS

Unravel mysterious unexplored lands, each with their own landmarks and creatures.

Find Eden focuses on detailed natural worlds to immerse you in the story. You explore, solve puzzles, fight monsters and upgrade your new awakened powers. Reshape these worlds and help out the cats! You meet some kitties who want to know you, but some just want to bug you.

MAIN GAME FEATURES

  • Classic side-scrolling action, with all the modern trimmings

  • Various powers

  • Plan ahead and build your fighting route

  • A cute main story that leaves you wanting more

  • Befriend cats!

  • Battle with creepy monsters

  • Find clues and solve riddles

  • Make your way through all the traps

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or dedicated GPU with at least 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with at least 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended for enhanced gameplay experience

name: Find Eden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: ntel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or dedicated GPU with at least 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No VR supported
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (or newer) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with at least 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No VR supported
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended for enhanced gameplay experience

short_description: Play as Timmy, whisked into a mysterious cat realm invaded by monsters. Journey through enchanting realms, solve puzzles, and harness new abilities to save this world—and maybe your own—in a cozy, dark, and hand-drawn 2D adventure full of secrets and quirky cats.
